about_the_game:
Monocle Man is a high-class Square.

Travel through your Squares Rage Puzzles in style with Monocle Man.

Purchasing this DLC unlocks the associated playable character in the parent game "Squares Rage."
detailed_description:
Monocle Man is a high-class Square.

Travel through your Squares Rage Puzzles in style with Monocle Man.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10/XP(?) (Don't use XP... who still uses that?!)
  • Processor: Pretty much any processor will do.
  • Graphics: Nothing fancy. Be able to at least handle pixel-art/8-bit style graphics.
  • Sound Card: Pretty much any.

short_description: Travel through your Squares Rage Puzzles in style with Monocle Man!
